system.description: Force a creature life force and body into a gem. Gem holds the creature until broken. Two methods: (1) Speak final word as standard action - subject gets SR and Will save; speaking creature name ignores SR and adds +2 DC. (2) Trigger object with name and word - when subject accepts object, no SR or save. Gem must be worth 1,000 gp per HD of creature.

components.materialDescription: Gem worth 1,000 gp per HD of target. Focus for trigger method: prepared trigger object.
